text: @NYGovCuomo @Laurie_Garrett Why should anyone trust government to tell us what is safe when coronavirus grew right under your noses and yet no one could get tested for it? By the time you started testing for community spread thousands had it. Now gov thinks it's ok to abandon social distancing at times? No.
